code: @Override public PositionOutputStream create(long blockSizeHint) {     if (used.compareAndSet(false, true)) {         return new PositionOutputStreamAdapter(stream).     } else {         throw new IllegalStateException("A stream against this file was already created.").     } }
@Override public PositionOutputStream createOrOverwrite(long blockSizeHint) {     return create(blockSizeHint). }
